## Library.DeepAlias type

An [Library.Alias](./design-token-library.library.alias.md) that supports complex token value types such as [DesignToken.Border](./design-token-library.designtoken.border.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DeepAlias<V extends DesignToken.Values.Any, T extends Context<any>> = {
        [K in keyof V]: V[K] extends DesignToken.Values.Any ? V[K] | Alias<DesignToken.TokenByValue<V[K]>, T> | DeepAlias<V[K], T> : never;
    };
```
**References:** [DesignToken.Values.Any](./design-token-library.designtoken.values.any.md)<!-- -->, [Context](./design-token-library.library.context.md)<!-- -->, [Alias](./design-token-library.library.alias.md)<!-- -->, [DesignToken.TokenByValue](./design-token-library.designtoken.tokenbyvalue.md)<!-- -->, [DeepAlias](./design-token-library.library.deepalias.md)
